Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
  GeometricShape
      Polygon
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnotherComparable, Comparable, Nearable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Rectangle, Triangle
public abstract class Polygon
extends GeometricShape

Abstract class Polygon is a GeometricShape that focuses on the shape's regularity and number of sides.

Version:
October 21, 2016
Author:
Alex Yu
